channel.title: [Zenith] Dwarf Multi Cannon
channel.description:
is it hard to add the dwarf mutli cannon, to zenith scape's source?
if so we can maybe handle some bussines. Add me on skype:[b] ownedin3d [/b] or PM me on here.

item.title: [Zenith] Dwarf Multi Cannon
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

[quote=“Savions Sw, post:3, topic:459302”]I would not agree with Kastro.

If your new, dont use snippets, use tutorails wich tells you what the codes means.
If you stay using snippets, you wont get any smarter.

And no, its not hard. The only problem is that its attacking non-attackable npcs too like bankers.[/quote]

Sorry I miss worded what I meant to say; I meant use a snippet from him to grab a concept on how the code actually looks so he is able to familiarise himself with it, but yes you are right tutorials are much better but I’ve not seen any out for the multi-dwarf cannon.

Read full topic

item.title: [Zenith] Dwarf Multi Cannon
item.dc:creator: @Savions_Sw Savions Sw
item.description:
@Savions_Sw wrote:

I would not agree with Kastro.

If your new, dont use snippets, use tutorails wich tells you what the codes means.
If you stay using snippets, you wont get any smarter.

And no, its not hard. The only problem is that its attacking non-attackable npcs too like bankers.

Read full topic

item.title: [Zenith] Dwarf Multi Cannon
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

Well if you’re new to the world of programming, everything seems hard.

OT: There’s a snippet located in the tutorials section, be sure to check it out as its rather useful although you may need to convert the code to your own revision. If a problem arises just reply on this thread and I’m sure myself as well as others will be willing to assist you.

Read full topic
